title: app_config order is different in sqlite
body:
### steps to reproduce:
1. set up owncloud with sqlite
2. set up another owncloud wiht mysql
3. in both instances, do a `select * from app_config where configkey='enabled'`;

### expected result:
app order is the same

### actual result:
app order is sorted alphabetically in mysql but app order seems to be random in sqlite.

the order in which apps are loaded might influence the behavior of hooks and proxies, which might sometimes reveal strange bugs that are only reproducible on some instances. such issues have already been met twice before.

to make sure that the app order is consistent, i suggest that we add a `order by` clause to the `app_config` selects to enforce an order.

cc @schiesbn
